code: import"./StarBorder.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StarBorder=_ref=>{let{as:Component="button",className="",color="white",speed="6s",thickness=1,children,...rest}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Component,{className:`star-border-container ${className}`,style:{padding:`${thickness}px 0`,...rest.style},...rest,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"border-gradient-bottom",style:{background:`radial-gradient(circle, ${color}, transparent 10%)`,animationDuration:speed}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"border-gradient-top",style:{background:`radial-gradient(circle, ${color}, transparent 10%)`,animationDuration:speed}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"inner-content",children:children})]});};export default StarBorder;
